summary: "The End of America" details the ten steps a country takes when it slides toward fascism. It's not a "lefty" taught-to-me, but rather a historical look at trends in once-functioning ... See full summary »
cast: David Antoon|Vincent Cannistraro|James Cullen|Amy Goodman|Nicholas Kristof|Maria LaHood|Michael Ratner|Barry Steinhardt|Josh Wolf|Naomi Wolf|James Yee|David Zirin
title: The End of America
